metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7953 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
Buffer underflow in X.org libXvMC before 1.0.10 allows remote X servers tohave unspecified impact via an empty string.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7953` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxvmc1 - 2:1.0.10-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libxvmc package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.0.10-1').
